mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(MANAGER_QUESTION MANAGER_QUESTION_PK)*/ ROWNUM RN, QUESTIONNO, MQ.MEMBERNO, MEMBERNAME, MEMBERPHONE, MEMBEREMAIL, QUESTIONTITLE, QUESTIONCONTENTS FROM MANAGER_QUESTION MQ, MANAGER_MEMBER MM WHERE MQ.MEMBERNO=MM.MEMBERNO AND ROWNUM <= (#{pageNum}*#{amount})) WHERE (RN > (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount})

SELECT * FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(MANAGER_ANSWER MANAGER_ANSWER_PK)*/ ROWNUM RN, ANSWERNO, MQ.QUESTIONNO, MQ.MEMBERNO, ANSWERTITLE, ANSWERCONTENTS,QUESTIONTITLE,QUESTIONCONTENTS, MEMBERNAME,MEMBERPHONE,MEMBEREMAIL FROM MANAGER_QUESTION MQ, MANAGER_ANSWER MA, MANAGER_MEMBER MM WHERE MA.QUESTIONNO=MQ.QUESTIONNO AND MQ.MEMBERNO = MM.MEMBERNO AND ROWNUM <= (#{pageNum}*#{amount})) WHERE (RN > (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MANAGER_QUESTION WHERE QUESTIONNO>0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MANAGER_ANSWER WHERE ANSWERNO>0

SELECT QUESTIONNO, MM.MEMBERNO, MEMBERNAME, MEMBERPHONE, MEMBEREMAIL, QUESTIONTITLE, QUESTIONCONTENTS FROM MANAGER_QUESTION MQ, MANAGER_MEMBER MM WHERE MQ.MEMBERNO=MM.MEMBERNO AND QUESTIONNO=#{questionNo}

SELECT ANSWERNO, MQ.QUESTIONNO, MQ.MEMBERNO, ANSWERTITLE, ANSWERCONTENTS,QUESTIONTITLE,QUESTIONCONTENTS, MEMBERNAME,MEMBERPHONE,MEMBEREMAIL FROM MANAGER_QUESTION MQ, MANAGER_ANSWER MA, MANAGER_MEMBER MM WHERE MA.QUESTIONNO=MQ.QUESTIONNO AND MQ.MEMBERNO = MM.MEMBERNO AND ANSWERNO=#{answerNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MANAGER_ANSWER(ANSWERNO, ANSWERTITLE, ANSWERCONTENTS, QUESTIONNO) VALUES(SEQUENCE_ANSWER.NEXTVAL, #{answerTitle}, #{answerContents}, #{questionNo})
